import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./login.css";// Import CSS for styling
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[userid,setUserid]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[userData,setUserData]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError(null);setUserData(null);try{const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/login",{userid,password});setUserData(response.data);}catch(err){setError("Invalid credentials or server error");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"User ID",value:userid,onChange:e=>setUserid(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error}),userData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Welcome, ",userData.userid||"Admin","!"]}),Array.isArray(userData)?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"All Users:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:userData.map((user,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[user.userid," - ",user.role," - ",user.password_hash]},index))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Role: ",userData.role," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," Password Hash: ",userData.password_hash]})]})]})});}export default Login;
